Plot: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.
Writer: Neil Burger (screenplay), Steven Millhauser (short story "Eisenheim the Illusionist")
Actors: Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti, Jessica Biel, Rufus Sewell
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 10 nominations.
Title: The Illusionist
